meanings.definition: Plural form of antihelix: the curved ridge of cartilage on the outer ear.
meanings.sent1: The antihelixes help shape the outer ear.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the antihelixes to understand ear anatomy.
meanings.sent3: When the antihelixes are tickled, it feels funny!
meanings.sent4: Her ears were like delicate antihelixes, gracefully curved.
meanings.sent5: The antihelixes resemble tiny hills on the ear landscape.
